page.title: 06HOUSING & POPULATION
page.content: Broadmayne:Up to 1955 village of some 300 inhabitants.Now over 1000,area being within commuting distance of Portland:Navy,Bovington:Army,Winfrith: Atomic Energy,Dorchester:County Town. Some listed houses,some thatched.West Dorset Distrit Council owns 53 of the 422 homes:33 for general needs,8flats & 12 bungalows for the elderly. Broadmayne First School incentive for young people to take homes as elderly die.Recent Govt.inquiry refused consent for further big estate. Warmwell parish has a manor house,45 dwellings,some thatched,some rented. Pop.145.Poxwell:Elizabethan manor house,farm,11 owner-occupied & 2 farm cottages.Some farm buildings date from late 16thC.Pop.40
